The Baseus Super Energy Pro Series Car Jump Starter Power Bank has a large 12,000 mAh battery capacity. It helps start a car without any problems and also charges phones and laptops. The Baseus Super Energy Pro Series power bank has a 1000 A peak current and a 600 A starting current. The 1000-amp peak current ensures lightning-fast operation of the device. It has a built-in flashlight and a display that shows the battery level. The flashlight can be used as a standard flashlight. It consumes very little power when in standby mode. If not used, it can retain up to 85% of the energy one year after the last full charge. The Baseus power bank includes crocodile clips for connecting to the battery and USB and USB Type-C for power outputs. It is fully operational at both extreme low and high temperatures.

Start Car up to 50 Times

The Baseus Car Jump Starter 12000mAh Power Bank can start the car up to 50 times on full charge. The car starts quickly and with high intensity. The device is suitable for a variety of vehicles, including those with 12V/6 gasoline engines and 12V/3.5 diesel engines. This useful accessory can be used to quickly start a minivan, sedan, SUV, motorcycle, or electric car, among other things.

Built-in Safeguards Protect Connected Devices

Baseus Super Energy's Pro Series Car Jump Starter 12000mAh Power Bank includes built-in protection to keep connected devices safe. It also has highly efficient polymer secondary cells that are resistant to extreme cold and heat.

Built-in Display

The Baseus Super Energy Pro Series Car Jump Starter 12000mAh Power Bank also has a built-in display for informing you of your battery level when jump-started.

Built-in Flashlight

The Baseus Super Energy Pro Series Car Jump Starter 12000mAh Power Bank features a built-in flashlight. You can use it as a traditional flashlight.
